org.jlab.geom

Class Path3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.geom.Path3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transformable

    public class Path3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transformable
    Class to present a path in 3D. Path consists of collection of Point3D objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Path3D()
      default constructor to create an empty path.

        public Path3D()

    • Method Detail

      • addPoint

        public void addPoint(double x,
                     double y,
                     double z)
        Add a point to the path with given coordinates (x,y,z)
        Parameters:
        x - component of the point
        y - y component of the point
        z - z component of the point

      • addPoint

        public void addPoint(Point3D p)
        Add given point to the path. The content of the point is copied, so changing the point after this call will no affect the path.
        Parameters:
        p - point to be added to the path.

      • nodes

        public int nodes()
        Returns the number of nodes in the path (number of points)
        Returns:

      • getNode

        public Point3D getNode(int index)
        Returns a point corresponding to the node=index
        Parameters:
        index - number of node to read
        Returns:

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the path. The array of points will be emptied.

      • distance

        public double distance(Point3D p)
        Calculates the distance for the path up to the point given in the argument. First the closest segment in the path to the given point. then the path is calculated until the node that contains the segment of closest approach. and the resulting path length is returned.
        Parameters:
        p - Point3D object of a point in space.
        Returns:
        distance of the path up to the given point.

      • length

        public double length(int lastnode)
        Calculates the length of the path up to the node = last node.
        Parameters:
        lastnode - number of nodes to run over in calculation
        Returns:
        length of the path from the origin to the - last node.

      • generate

        public void generate(double vx,
                     double vy,
                     double vz,
                     double px,
                     double py,
                     double pz,
                     double length,
                     int npoints)
        Generates a path for at given origin (vx,vy,vz) for a vector (px,py,pz) for given length with given number of points.
        Parameters:
        vx - x coordinate of the origin
        vy - y coordinate of the origin
        vz - z coordinate of the origin
        px - direction vector x component
        py - direction vector y component
        pz - direction vector z component
        length - length of the path to generate
        npoints - number of nodes in the path

      • generate

        public void generate(Vector3D origin,
                     Vector3D direction,
                     double length,
                     int npoints)
        Generates path in a straight line starting with given origin and with the given direction.
        Parameters:
        origin - vector of the origin point
        direction - direction vector
        length - path length
        npoints - number of nodes in the path

      • generateRandom

        public void generateRandom(double vx,
                           double vy,
                           double vz,
                           double theta_min_deg,
                           double theta_max_deg,
                           double phi_min_deg,
                           double phi_max_deg,
                           double len,
                           int npoints)
        Generated a random path from given origin, and given ranges for theta and phi angle, Angles are given in degrees.
        Parameters:
        vx - - origin x coordinate
        vy - - origin y coordinate
        vz - - origin z coordinate
        theta_min_deg - - minimum theta angle in degrees
        theta_max_deg - - maximum theta angle in degrees
        phi_min_deg - - minimum phi angles in degrees
        phi_max_deg - - maximum phi angle in degrees
        len - - length of the path in cm
        npoints - - number of points along the path

      • closestNode

        public int closestNode(Point3D p)
        Finds the closest node to the given point.
        Parameters:
        p - point in space
        Returns:
        index of the closest node.
